title: Continuing Education for Practicing Engineers via Visual Learning: Simulation/VR-Based Advanced Science Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Engineering Theories and Practical Work Experience
context.additional_context: Small-scale workshop format utilizing smartphone-based VR simulations and visual materials

learning_goals: Learners can visually explain three or more scientific principles using VR simulations
Learners can present two solutions applicable to real-world engineering problems by analyzing visual materials
Learners verify comprehension of visual learning content at 80% or higher accuracy through weekly formative assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
